name: Bezubaan Phir Se
artistName: Anushka Manchanda, Madhav Krishna & Vishal Dadlani
plainLyrics:
Jaan le ki kismat ne baante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain
Aur main bhi hoon ziddi
Aaun kismat ke aade
Naa roke rukoon, tu gira main utthun
Pinjre todkar, phailaaunga main par

Tujh mein jitna hai zor
Tu lagale magar
Hans ke kat jaayega
Na jhukega ye sar

Jaan le ki kismat ne baante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain
Naa roke rukoon, tu gira main utthun

Regzaaron mein, aag hai jitni
Hai lahu kholta mera
Inn ragon mein phir bhi
Khaaksaaron ko, khaak hi kaafi
Raas mujhko hai khamoshi meri

Bezubaan kab se, main raha
Begunaah sehta, main raha
Bezubaan kab se, main raha
Begunaah sehta, main raha

Jaan le ki kismat ne baante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain
Kismat ne baante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain

Sau sawaal hain, sau hai laalatey
Mere taraano pe, likhii hai kaalikhey

Ye aag sapno ki, raakh haathon mein
Sooni aankhon mein
Chalti umeed hai aakhri
Na mila mauka, na mili maafi
Kehdo kitni sazaa aur baaki

Bezubaan kab se, main raha
Begunaah sehta, main raha
Bezubaan kab se, main raha
Begunaah sehta, main raha

Jaan le ki kismat ne baante hain
Raahon mein kaante hain
Aur main bhi hoon ziddi
Aaun kismat ke aade
Naa roke rukoon, tu gira main utthun
Pinjre todkar, phailaaunga main par

Tujh mein jitna hai zor
Tu lagale magar
Tu lagale magar
Tu lagale magar
Hans ke kat jaayega
Na jhukega ye sar
